Sentencas: 8 mol% yttria-stabilised zirconia (8YSZ) was annealed at high temperature under various compressive stress conditions.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The conductivity was measured during the annealing whilst the grain structure as well as the crystal structure was examined before and after annealing.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The conductivity of 8YSZ subjected to no stress decreased with the annealing time due to the increase of the tetragonal phase.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The compressive stress of 50 MPa had no effect on either the decrease of the conductivity or the increase of the tetragonal phase.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The compressive stresses of 100 and 200 MPa had also no influence on them, except for the initial decrease in the conductivity caused by the fracture.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The average grain size was almost constant regardless of the annealing time, temperature and the compressive stress.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing

Sentencas: The degradation phenomenon of 8YSZ therefore could not be influenced by a compressive stress of up to 200 MPa.
Titulo: Degradation of 8 mol%-yttria stabilised zirconia subjected to compressive stress during annealing
